usage.cn: 我确定这次还是和老板一起。
usage.eng: I'm sure it's with the boss again this time.

usage.cn: 和我们老板一起出差让人非常有压力。
usage.eng: Nothing is more stressful than going on a business trip with our boss.

usage.cn: 上次我和老板一起出差，我甚至没吃饱。
usage.eng: Last time I went on a business trip with the boss, I didn't even have enough to eat.

usage.cn: 如果你觉得你的老师十分苛刻严厉，那么等着瞧你的老板吧。老板可没有任期限制。
usage.eng: If you think your teacher is tough， wait until you get a boss. He doesn't have tenure.
